statements: SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT satellite_id, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM climate_data WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE data_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01';
SELECT satellite_id, pressure FROM climate_data WHERE temperature < 10 AND humidity > 80;
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM climate_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC
SELECT satellite_id, temperature, pressure FROM climate_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT DISTINCT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM climate_data WHERE pressure > 1000 ORDER BY satellite_id ASC, latitude DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM climate_data WHERE data_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ClimateData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM ClimateData WHERE satellite_id = 2;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM ClimateData ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description, start_date, end_date FROM ClimatePatterns;
SELECT * FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM ClimateData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31';
SELECT id, temperature FROM ClimateData WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature < 0 OR temperature > 40 AND satellite_id = 2;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM ClimatePatterns WHERE start_date <= '2021-09-15' AND end_date >= '2021-09-30';
SELECT * FROM Climate_Data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT data_id, latitude, longitude FROM Climate_Data WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY longitude ASC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM Satellite_Information WHERE orbit_type = 'Low Earth Orbit';
SELECT * FROM Data_Analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%anomaly%' ORDER BY analysis_timestamp ASC;
SELECT data_id, satellite_id, analysis_result FROM Data_Analysis WHERE analysis_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Climate_Data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT data_id, latitude, longitude FROM Climate_Data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY data_id ASC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM Satellite_Information WHERE orbit_type = 'Low Earth Orbit';
SELECT data_id, temperature, humidity FROM Climate_Data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Data_Analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%errors%' ORDER BY analysis_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM climate_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM climate_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY latitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_records WHERE record_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01' ORDER BY record_time DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date, orbit_type FROM satellites WHERE launch_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE orbit_type = 'LEO';
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources WHERE source_type LIKE '%weather%';
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude > 100;

SELECT record_time, satellite_name, temperature, humidity FROM satellite_records JOIN satellites ON satellite_records.satellite_id = satellites.id JOIN climate_data ON satellite_records.data_id = climate_data.id ORDER BY record_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM climate_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM climate_patterns WHERE pattern_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM climate_trends ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellite_metadata WHERE orbit_type = 'geostationary';
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM climate_patterns WHERE LENGTH(pattern_name) > 5;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM climate_trends WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellite_metadata WHERE orbit_type = 'geostationary' ORDER BY launch_date ASC;
SELECT image_url FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 3;
